subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Dan Uggla had endeared himself to the Braves by never allowing his early-season mega-slump to affect him, in the clubhouse, on defense or on the base paths.
snippet: Dan Uggla had endeared himself to the Braves by never allowing his early-season mega-slump to affect him, in the clubhouse, on defense or on the base paths.
